content.description:
Use the same start as

Dark Flow

, begin by sitting deep under the overhang next to the rock supporting the Multiverse Boulder. From there, traverse left and work your way around the boulder's east-facing lip.
content.protection: A pad or two is all you need.
content.location: This is on the Multiverse Boulder.

content.description:
Sit start at the boulder's southeast overhang with a right hand on a crimp and a left hand at the lip. From there, work north under the overhang until you connect to the start of

Dark Flow

where you work up and over the lip to top it out.

The crux was negotiating the section where the tree is, as it forces you to abandon the lip by falling into a difficult left hand.
content.location: This is located on the Multiverse Boulder.

content.description: Climb from the lowest point beneath the overhang on good huecos until you reach the lip.  At the lip, use a good sloper and a nasty crimp to gain the larger crimps/arete and the eventual topout.
content.protection: Pad or two and a spot.  It has a pretty good landing.
content.location: Located at the Multiverse Boulder, the route climbs between the young tree and another large-sized rock which helps support the Multiverse Boulder.
